equipment.itemName: Earth: Lyra Bow of Warm Springtime

options.name: Solid Earth Starfield
options.explain:
Overall Damage +4%
Atk. Increase +245%

[Blessing of the Four Seasons]
Receive a blessing from the four seasons to reinforce yourself. 50% of the Blessing effect also applied to all party members.
- Can't stack with the same Blessing.

* Blessing of Warm Spring
 - Overall Damage +1%
* Blessing of Vibrant Summer
  - HP/MP +10% for 10 sec. every 10 sec.
options.explainDetail:
Overall Damage +4%
Atk. Increase +245%

[Blessing of the Four Seasons]
Receive a blessing from the four seasons to reinforce yourself. 50% of the Blessing effect also applied to all party members.
- Can't stack with the same Blessing.

* Blessing of Warm Spring
 - Overall Damage +1%
* Blessing of Vibrant Summer
  - HP/MP +10% for 10 sec. every 10 sec.

options.explain:
[Raging Lightning Cloud]
Attacks summon a Raging Lightning Cloud that attacks up to 4 enemies and applies effects, depending on the number of equipped Thunder equipment (2/3/5).
- Raging Lightning Cloud Summon Cooldown: 7.5 sec./5 sec./3 sec.
- Inflicts 1,500%of total Atk. Increase, Neutralize Gauge -5

active.explain:
Provides additional abilities, depending on the equipment's Reinforcement/Amplification levels.

Applies the following, depending on the total Reinforcement/Amplification levels of armor/accessories/Special Equipment.
- Skill range +2% for every 11 total levels (Max Stacks: 7)
- Armor: Physical/Magical damage reduction +1% for every 5 (Max Stacks: 7)
- Accessories: Overall Damage +1% for every 3 (Max Stacks: 7)
- Special Equipment: All speed +2% for every 3 (Max Stacks: 7)undefined
